comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Fixed in revision 312842. The analyzer class can now be specified using the "analyzer" parameter in search configuration.

For now it is not possible to specify stop words or any other analyzer-specific configuration.

comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Property 'analyzer' is not set because there is no public getAnalyzer() method.

Fixed in revision: 330270

description: Jackrabbit does not support the specification of a Lucene analyzer class (org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer) to be used by a SearchIndex (or other Lucene based indices) declared in an XML configuration file. Custom analyzer is useful for indexing language specific content.
summary: Make it possible to configure Lucene Analyzer for SearchIndex
